official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Tralomethrin.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on (1 R,3S)3(1,2',2',2'-tetrabromoethyl)-2,2 dimethylcycloproa-panecarboxylic acid (5)-alpha- cyano-3- phonoxybenzyl ester (also known as tralomethrin).

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Tralomethrin.
